titles.title: To waive temporarily the Medicaid enrollment composition rule for certain health maintenance organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. Waives, with respect to HealthCare USA, Inc. and Ultramedix Health Care Systems Inc., operating in Florida, for contract periods beginning on or after July 1, 1996, and ending on or before June 30, 2000, the (75-25) requirement under the Social Security Act that Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries under titles XVIII and XIX of that Act constitute less than 75 percent of the membership of a participating health maintenance organization.
